document_data.name: ''Redshield''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Redshield''''' was an enchanted [[shield]] that was the personal shield of [[Rhaumon Bloodaxe]]. It was wielded alongside the ''[[Bloodaxe]]''.
document_data.Description: The ''Redshield'' had a ''+2'' enchantment, just slightly less enchanted that its companion [[battleaxe]].
document_data.History: In the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], many [[undead]] beings watched over the resting place of the First Axe of Ruathym, Rhaumon Bloodaxe. Patrolling the mansion to the northwest of Ruathym, they would attack intruders on sight, making it difficult for anyone to access the magical axe and shield that lay there.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Rhaumon Bloodaxe, First Axe of Ruathym
